attributes.action: announce with immediate effect that Heathrow will not be developed because we have only fifty days to save the planet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister is going to Copenhagen. In the light of his attending surely the best thing for Mr Brown is to announce that in perpetuity, because of the threat to the environment, that because there are only fifty days to save the planet, he will back a proposal never to develope a third runway at Heathrow.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
